ygData.subject: Question about bard armor quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Having read the spoilers about the new bard quests on the test server, I m wondering if we will have to compete with other classes for the components to
ygData.messageBody:
Having read the spoilers about the new bard quests on the test server, I'm
wondering if we will have to compete with other classes for the components
to complete these quests? For example, we need lambent stones for each of
the armor pieces. Will other classes also need lambent stones for their
armor quests or are the components they need completely different than ours?
The same question applies to the special loot items we need. I hope that
each class has their own unique components required for their quest. You
would assume that if lambent armor is bard only then only bards have a need
for lambent stones. However, everyone knows that you can't assume anything
when it comes to EQ. Can anyone provide confirmation on this?

Galtin of E'ci
